data.title: summer lunch menu by mark best
data.body: aeg ambassador mark best's summer eats are guaranteed to help you make the most of the warmer weather and entertaining at home.

data.title: a traditional christmas eve, mark best style
data.body: one of Australia's best chefs and aeg ambassador, mark best, shares his favourite christmas eve menu which is sure to impress your guests .

data.title: taking taste further
data.body: this exclusive cookbook gives you all the know-how you need. We've designed it to make sure you get the most out of our products - and the best out of your food.
